statements: SELECT * FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, engagement_score FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score > 50;
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE interaction_date = '2021-09-15';
SELECT campaign_id, engagement_score FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE campaign_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement_metrics ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC, engagement_score ASC
SELECT customer_id, campaign_id, engagement_score FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score > 0.75 ORDER BY campaign_id
SELECT customer_id, engagement_score, interaction_date FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY engagement_score DESC
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_id FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score < 0.5

SELECT customer_id, engagement_score, interaction_date FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score < 0.6 OR interaction_date = '2021-06-15' ORDER BY customer_id, engagement_score ASC, interaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, email, subscription_status FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, subscription_status FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, subscription_status FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM engagement_metrics GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, campaign_id, engagement_score FROM engagement_metrics WHERE conversions > 10 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers c JOIN engagement_metrics em ON c.customer_id = em.customer_id WHERE c.subscription_status = TRUE AND em.clicks > 100 ORDER BY em.clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement_metrics;
SELECT customer_id, engagement_score FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score > 50 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01' AND end_date <= '2023-06-30';
SELECT customer_id, engagement_time FROM campaign_engagement_logs WHERE customer_id = 1001 ORDER BY engagement_time ASC;
SELECT AVG(engagement_score) AS average_score FROM customer_engagement_metrics;
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score > 50 ORDER BY engagement_date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers FROM marketing_campaigns INNER JOIN campaign_engagement_logs ON marketing_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_engagement_logs.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(engagement_score) AS avg_score FROM customer_engagement_metrics GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY avg_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY campaign_id;

SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, COUNT(log_id) AS total_engagements FROM marketing_campaigns LEFT JOIN campaign_engagement_logs ON marketing_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_engagement_logs.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_id ORDER BY total_engagements DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '1ef4d21e-a5eb-4f26-89ac-3b1bc9a38c8e';
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, clicks FROM campaign_metrics WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT * FROM ad_clicks WHERE click_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE name='John Smith';

SELECT c.customer_id, c.name, cm.impressions, cr.success_rate FROM customers c JOIN campaign_metrics cm ON c.customer_id = cm.campaign_id JOIN campaign_results cr ON cm.campaign_id = cr.campaign_id WHERE cr.success_rate > 0.5;
SELECT cr.success_rate, cr.revenue FROM campaign_results cr WHERE cr.revenue > 10000 ORDER BY cr.revenue DESC;

SELECT ac.click_id, c.name, cm.impressions, cm.clicks FROM ad_clicks ac JOIN customers c ON ac.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN campaign_metrics cm ON ac.campaign_id = cm.campaign_id ORDER BY cm.clicks DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT campaign_name, budget, start_date FROM campaign ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT engagement_id, engagement_date, engagement_type FROM engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'click';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT engagement_date, engagement_type FROM engagement JOIN customers ON engagement.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaign JOIN clicks ON campaign.campaign_id = clicks.engagement_id WHERE click_date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY budget ASC;

SELECT customer_name, engagement_date, conversion_type FROM conversions JOIN engagement ON conversions.engagement_id = engagement.engagement_id JOIN customers ON engagement.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
